amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the Department of Transportation from using funds for remote work agreements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
